name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce platforms at scale.
I build tools that help developers ship faster. My focus is on AI-powered developer tooling, MCP servers, and real-time systems.
Side projects: aiocean.io (desktop apps), 12bit.vn (writing about engineering), onepercent.plus (product thinking).
Open source: Created obsidian-open-gate (222⭐), jira-mcp (79⭐), google-mcp (20⭐). Contributed to MCP ecosystem and dev tools.
Co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016. Been coding since 2011, from PHP to Go to TypeScript.
I care about: pragmatic engineering, tight feedback loops, tools that fade into the background.
Based in Việt Nam. Available for consulting on Go backends, MCP servers, and AI tooling.
now: Shipping Clik v0.16.26 releases at aiocean
Active development on vite-plugin-ai-annotator and research-kit
